about_the_game:
The game is an exciting beauty jigsaw puzzle that combines elements of casual entertainment and mental challenges. The game mainly through the mouse drag scattered pieces into a complete picture of beauty to provide fun and challenge. Here are the game's main features and descriptions:
Game Features:
1.Beauty paintings: The puzzles in the game are all kinds of charming beauty paintings, these paintings are full of artistic sense and beauty.

2.Puzzle difficulty: Puzzle difficulty increases gradually, and players can choose from different difficulty levels, from easy entry level to advanced challenges.

3.Collection of beauty pictures: After completing the puzzle, players can collect pictures of beauty to form their own beauty gallery.

4.Social interaction: Players can share their puzzle achievements with friends, challenging them to complete the same puzzle and increasing social interaction.

5.Reward system: There is a reward system in the game, players can get rewards after completing puzzles, unlock new beauty paintings and challenges.

This game is suitable for those who are looking for leisure entertainment and challenge, but also offers the opportunity to collect pictures of beautiful women. Whether you enjoy it alone or share your achievements with friends, you can find fun in this beauty puzzle.

name: Venus Puzzles
short_description: Come explore a unique world of beautiful women, unleash your puzzle solving skills, collect the most fascinating artworks, and enjoy endless enjoyment.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
